summary: The East Coast, or Atlantic Coast, is where the eastern US meets the Atlantic Ocean. It includes 14 states, plus Washington, D.C. These states are: Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Rhode Island, South Carolina, and Virginia. Also, three nearby states, Pennsylvania, Vermont, and West Virginia, are often included. This region is super important in US history, as it's where the first 13 colonies were.
title: East Coast of the United States
